short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture and bookmark web content, organizing it into your AI-driven repository for seamless research, learning, and collaboration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture, Comment, Highlight and Bookmark with Spaceduck Web Clipper.

Spaceduck melds your ideas and findings into a user-friendly platform. Save notes, bookmarks, articles, images, videos, and anything else you want to remember.

Enhance your Spaceduck experience with the Web Clipper, the ultimate tool for capturing web content. Easily take screenshots, leave live comments for visual feedback, bookmark pages, and highlight and save textâ€”all seamlessly organized within your Spaceduck workspace.

Simply put, we're building the world's best "Thinking and Research Tool".
